Text:
Thanks for the u/l's of this funny series. Reminds me of when I was a kid and caught this when they where in syndication. Good stuff! keep up the good work.

Are you going to up all of season 1?

Yes, I have the rest of Bud & Lou's first season and 
all of the superior second year too....but I'm taking
 a break from it for the next few days to upload 
other series such as The Mothers In-Law and 
Joan Rivers' late 1960s daytime talk show.
More Abbott and Costello coming your way next week!
